name: Heightened Focus
trigger: when you expend Focus Points on core techniques
effects: Flurry of Blows: if you expend 1 Focus Point, you can make three Unarmed Strikes instead of two
Patient Defense: when you expend 1 Focus Point, you gain temporary hit points equal to two rolls of your Martial Arts die
Step of the Wind: when you expend 1 Focus Point, you can move a willing Large or smaller creature within 5 feet with you until end of turn without provoking opportunity attacks
